verses.text: \w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* high \w priest|strong="G0749"\w* \w taken|strong="G2983"\w* from \w among|strong="G1537"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w* is \w ordained|strong="G2525"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w* \w in|strong="G2525"\w* \w things|strong="G3588"\w* \add pertaining\add* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* he may \w offer|strong="G4374"\w* \w both|strong="G5037"\w* \w gifts|strong="G1435"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w sacrifices|strong="G2378"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* \w sins|strong="G0266"\w*:

Who \w can|strong="G1410"\w* have compassion \w on|strong="G3356"\w* the \w ignorant|strong="G0050"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w on|strong="G3356"\w* them that are out of the \w way|strong="G4105"\w*; for \w that|strong="G1893"\w* \w he|strong="G4029"\w* \w himself|strong="G0846"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* is compassed \w with|strong="G4029"\w* \w infirmity|strong="G0769"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* by \w reason|strong="G1223"\w* \w here|strong="G3778"\w*\w of|strong="G1223"\w* he \w ought|strong="G3784"\w*, \w as|strong="G2531"\w* \w for|strong="G4012"\w* the \w people|strong="G2992"\w*, \w so|strong="G3779"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w for|strong="G4012"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w*, to \w offer|strong="G4374"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* \w sins|strong="G0266"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w man|strong="G5100"\w* \w taketh|strong="G2983"\w* this \w honour|strong="G5092"\w* unto \w himself|strong="G1438"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* he that is \w called|strong="G2564"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w as|strong="G2509"\w* \add was\add* \w Aaron|strong="G0002"\w*.

\w So|strong="G3779"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w glorified|strong="G1392"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w* to be \w made|strong="G1096"\w* an high \w priest|strong="G0749"\w*; \w but|strong="G0235"\w* he that \w said|strong="G2980"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Thou|strong="G4771"\w* \w art|strong="G1488"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w Son|strong="G5207"\w*, to \w day|strong="G4594"\w* \w have|strong="G1080"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w begotten|strong="G1080"\w* \w thee|strong="G4571"\w*.

\w As|strong="G2531"\w* he \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w another|strong="G2087"\w* \add place\add*, \w Thou|strong="G4771"\w* \add art\add* a \w priest|strong="G2409"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w ever|strong="G0165"\w* \w after|strong="G2596"\w* the \w order|strong="G5010"\w* of \w Melchisedec|strong="G3198"\w*.

\w Who|strong="G3739"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w days|strong="G2250"\w* \w of|strong="G4561"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w*, when he had offered \w up|strong="G4374"\w* \w prayers|strong="G1162"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w supplications|strong="G2428"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w strong|strong="G2478"\w* \w crying|strong="G2906"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w tears|strong="G1144"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* him that was \w able|strong="G1410"\w* to \w save|strong="G4982"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w death|strong="G2288"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* was \w heard|strong="G1522"\w* \w in|strong="G0575"\w* that he \w feared|strong="G2124"\w*;

\w Though|strong="G2539"\w* he \w were|strong="G5607"\w* a \w Son|strong="G5207"\w*, \w yet|strong="G2539"\w* learned \w he|strong="G3129"\w* \w obedience|strong="G5218"\w* \w by|strong="G0575"\w* the things \w which|strong="G3739"\w* he \w suffered|strong="G3958"\w*;

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* being made \w perfect|strong="G5048"\w*, he \w became|strong="G1096"\w* the \w author|strong="G0159"\w* \w of|strong="G4991"\w* \w eternal|strong="G0166"\w* \w salvation|strong="G4991"\w* unto \w all|strong="G3956"\w* them that \w obey|strong="G5219"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*;

\w Called|strong="G4316"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* an high \w priest|strong="G0749"\w* \w after|strong="G2596"\w* the \w order|strong="G5010"\w* of \w Melchisedec|strong="G3198"\w*.

\w Of|strong="G4012"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* we \w have|strong="G2254"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w things|strong="G3056"\w* to \w say|strong="G3004"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* hard to be \w uttered|strong="G1421"\w*, \w seeing|strong="G1893"\w* ye \w are|strong="G1096"\w* \w dull|strong="G3576"\w* of \w hearing|strong="G0189"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w when|strong="G2532"\w* \w for|strong="G1223"\w* the \w time|strong="G5550"\w* ye \w ought|strong="G3784"\w* to \w be|strong="G1511"\w* \w teachers|strong="G1320"\w*, ye \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w need|strong="G5532"\w* that \w one|strong="G5101"\w* \w teach|strong="G1321"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w* \w which|strong="G5101"\w* \add be\add* \w the|strong="G4747"\w* \w first|strong="G0746"\w* \w principles|strong="G4747"\w* of the \w oracles|strong="G3051"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* are \w become|strong="G1096"\w* such as \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w need|strong="G5532"\w* of \w milk|strong="G1051"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w of|strong="G5160"\w* \w strong|strong="G4731"\w* \w meat|strong="G5160"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* every \w one|strong="G3956"\w* that \w useth|strong="G3348"\w* \w milk|strong="G1051"\w* \add is\add* \w unskilful|strong="G0552"\w* in the \w word|strong="G3056"\w* of \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* he \w is|strong="G2076"\w* a \w babe|strong="G3516"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w strong|strong="G4731"\w* \w meat|strong="G5160"\w* \w belongeth|strong="G2076"\w* to them that are of full \w age|strong="G5046"\w*, \add even\add* those \w who|strong="G2192"\w* by reason \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w use|strong="G1838"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* their \w senses|strong="G0145"\w* \w exercised|strong="G1128"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w discern|strong="G1253"\w* \w both|strong="G5037"\w* \w good|strong="G2570"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w evil|strong="G2556"\w*.
